title: SOLD N300 Mayo Ed Delahanty PSA 1
author: the-illini

posts.post_title: SOLD N300 Mayo Ed Delahanty PSA 1
posts.post_content:
For sale is a very nice looking card of the great Ed Delahanty. Graded PSA 1 primarily due to scrapbook damage on the blank-back, the front presents much nicer with only a horizontal crease running through the lower third of the card that does not affect Ed's face. Really nice for the grade. SOLD
Please PM me or email [url]crb_972@yahoo.com[/url] to confirm. Thanks Chris

Card is sold. Thanks Mark.
